AAPL,Indie music body endorses Apple's new music streaming service June 24 Apple Inc's new music streaming service has been endorsed by the Worldwide Independent Network, an association for independent musicians, two days after the company reversed its decision of not paying musicians during a three-month trial.

BA,UPDATE 3-Boeing picks Muilenburg to succeed CEO McNerney, signals stabilityCORRECTED-INSIGHT-U.S. firms fear financing drought as deadline looms for trade bankCORRECTED-RPT-INSIGHT-U.S. firms fear financing drought as deadline looms for trade bankUPDATE 1-INSIGHT-U.S. firms fear financing drought as trade bank deadline loomsU.S. firms fear financing drought as trade bank deadline loomsBoeing says to slow production of 747 jetlinerNorwegian Air vows to double Dreamliners if U.S. OKs subsidiaryUPDATE 2-Boeing plans to further slow 747 jet production in 2016 SEATTLE, June 24 Boeing Co said on Wednesday it would slow production of its 747-8 jumbo jet by 23 percent to one per month starting in March, an effort to keep the production line running amid sluggish demand for the iconic, humped-top plane.  UPDATE 2-Boeing plans to further slow 747 jet production in 2016 SEATTLE, June 24 Boeing Co said on Wednesday it would slow production of its 747-8 jumbo jet by 23 percent to one per month starting in March, an effort to keep the production line running amid sluggish demand for the iconic, humped-top plane. Norwegian Air Shuttle ASA  will buy at least 17 Boeing Co  Dreamliners to double its long-haul fleet as soon as U.S. regulators approve flights on its Irish subsidiary, Chief Executive Officer Bjoern Kjos said in an interview Wednesday.UPDATE 2-Boeing plans to further slow 747 jet production in 2016 SEATTLE, June 24 Boeing Co said on Wednesday it would slow production of its 747-8 jumbo jet by 23 percent to one per month starting in March, an effort to keep the production line running amid sluggish demand for the iconic, humped-top plane. Norwegian Air Shuttle ASA  will buy at least 17 Boeing Co  Dreamliners to double its long-haul fleet as soon as U.S. regulators approve flights on its Irish subsidiary, Chief Executive Officer Bjoern Kjos said in an interview Wednesday.UPDATE 2-Boeing plans to further slow 747 jet production in 2016 SEATTLE, June 24 Boeing Co said on Wednesday it would slow production of its 747-8 jumbo jet by 23 percent to one per month starting in March, an effort to keep the production line running amid sluggish demand for the iconic, humped-top plane. Norwegian Air Shuttle ASA  will buy at least 17 Boeing Co  Dreamliners to double its long-haul fleet as soon as U.S. regulators approve flights on its Irish subsidiary, Chief Executive Officer Bjoern Kjos said in an interview Wednesday.UPDATE 2-Boeing plans to further slow 747 jet production in 2016 SEATTLE, June 24 Boeing Co said on Wednesday it would slow production of its 747-8 jumbo jet by 23 percent to one per month starting in March, an effort to keep the production line running amid sluggish demand for the iconic, humped-top plane. Norwegian Air Shuttle ASA  will buy at least 17 Boeing Co  Dreamliners to double its long-haul fleet as soon as U.S. regulators approve flights on its Irish subsidiary, Chief Executive Officer Bjoern Kjos said in an interview Wednesday.UPDATE 2-Boeing plans to further slow 747 jet production in 2016 SEATTLE, June 24 Boeing Co said on Wednesday it would slow production of its 747-8 jumbo jet by 23 percent to one per month starting in March, an effort to keep the production line running amid sluggish demand for the iconic, humped-top plane. Norwegian Air Shuttle ASA  will buy at least 17 Boeing Co  Dreamliners to double its long-haul fleet as soon as U.S. regulators approve flights on its Irish subsidiary, Chief Executive Officer Bjoern Kjos said in an interview Wednesday.UPDATE 2-Boeing plans to further slow 747 jet production in 2016 SEATTLE, June 24 Boeing Co said on Wednesday it would slow production of its 747-8 jumbo jet by 23 percent to one per month starting in March, an effort to keep the production line running amid sluggish demand for the iconic, humped-top plane. Norwegian Air Shuttle ASA  will buy at least 17 Boeing Co  Dreamliners to double its long-haul fleet as soon as U.S. regulators approve flights on its Irish subsidiary, Chief Executive Officer Bjoern Kjos said in an interview Wednesday.UPDATE 2-Boeing plans to further slow 747 jet production in 2016 SEATTLE, June 24 Boeing Co said on Wednesday it would slow production of its 747-8 jumbo jet by 23 percent to one per month starting in March, an effort to keep the production line running amid sluggish demand for the iconic, humped-top plane.
